channel.title: Recruiting.com Podcasts
channel.description: Interviews with interesting folks in the Recruiting and HR Industry

item.title: Interview With Bill Radin
item.description: Bill radin is a very well respected author of recruiting books. I had the opportunity to talk to Bill about a concept he calls Storyboarding.
item.itunes:summary: Bill radin is a very well respected author of recruiting books. I had the opportunity to talk to Bill about a concept he calls Storyboarding.

item.title: The Cheezhead Blog
item.description: Joel Cheesman has a blog called Cheezhead.com Joel told me a while back that his blog has become the center of his professional career. I asked him about it.
item.itunes:summary: Joel Cheesman has a blog called Cheezhead.com Joel told me a while back that his blog has become the center of his professional career. I asked him about it.

item.title: Interview with Lou Adler
item.description: Craig Silverman from hireability interviews Lou Adler
item.itunes:summary: Craig Silverman from hireability interviews Lou Adler

item.title: David Perry Interview
item.description: Recruiting.com Presents a Podcast with Anthiny J Interviewing David Perry
item.itunes:summary: Recruiting.com Presents a Podcast with Anthiny J Interviewing David Perry

item.title: Podcast with Craig Silverman
item.description: Craig Silverman is the Executive VP of Marketing and Sales for Hireability.
item.itunes:summary: Craig Silverman is the Executive VP of Marketing and Sales for Hireability.

item.title: Recruiting.com Interview With Dennis Smith
item.description: Interview I did with Dennis Smith who is the Recruiting Manager at Samsung
item.itunes:summary: Interview I did with Dennis Smith who is the Recruiting Manager at Samsung

item.title: Interview With Karina Miller
item.description: Recruiting.com conducts an interview with Karina Miller who is the Staffing Director at Impinj Semiconductor
item.itunes:summary: Recruiting.com conducts an interview with Karina Miller who is the Staffing Director at Impinj Semiconductor

item.title: Recruiting.com Interview With Joel Cheesman from HRSEO
item.description: Recruiting.com's first Podcast with Joel Cheesman. Joel is the President of HRSEO, a company involved in Search Engine Optimization for the Recruiting and HR Industry
item.itunes:summary: Recruiting.com's first Podcast with Joel Cheesman. Joel is the President of HRSEO, a company involved in Search Engine Optimization for the Recruiting and HR Industry
